input_text:
Job Title: Fabricator

Location: Portland, OR

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
OPTI STAFFING IS HIRING!

$17-$19 hr DOE

M-Th 6am-4:30pm

Tigard, OR.

Who We Are:

Our client is a world leader in precision plastic components, fabrication, and services for Innovative Manufacturing Solutions for Industry. Their products are an integral part of operations in many leading semiconductor fabrication facilities around the world.

What You ll Do:

Under the general direction of the Manufacturing Manager and Production Supervisor, Fabricator workers finish and package product. At an entry level, they are responsible for cleaning, labeling, packaging and weighing items appropriately. They also perform final checks for defective items before final packaging to the customer.

This position is great for someone looking to start their career. Someone who is dependable, can follow and retain verbal and written instructions. Has the ability to work overtime, weekend and/or evening hours as required.

The long term idea is that you are able to learn how to be a Plastic Welder with on the job training.

Duties And Responsibilities

The individual in this position is expected to engage in the following work-related activities.

 It is required that this position actively supports all employees and customers in a positive manner. Report to work on-time during scheduled shift hours. Read job folders and assemble products or the different parts of products. Inspect partially-assembled parts before performing the final assembly. Inspect and measure parts after assembly as required to insure made to print. Correctly complete all relevant paperwork. Keep the work station organized and orderly. Ensure that production parts, tools, test equipment and documentation are properly store and maintained. Follow the targets and deadlines set for production. Adhere to all safety procedures, environmental guidelines and company rules and regulations. Use measurement tools such as micrometers, calipers, height gage. Must be able to do deburring, routing, gluing, bending, custom bending, packaging parts, and moving products onto pallets. Effectively use tools such as table saw, routers, band saw, chop saw, power hand tools. Properly bag, label, and package products for safe shipping. Must be able to follow Cleanroom procedures for cleaning and packaging products. Must be able to do part cleaning/bagging/packaging, hardware installment, stamping, vapor polish, flame polish, and ultra sonic cleaning. Help keep Cleanroom clean and properly stocked with supplies. Perform all other duties assigned by supervisor or manager. Regular attendance is essential due to the need to work as part of a team; necessary face-to-face interaction with employees; and working with job folders, products and/or equipment on-site.

Whats in it for You:

Chance to be on a winning team!Working with a company that takes pride in their work!Opportunity for growth within the organization!Fantastic wage  plus great benefitsTen hour shifts M-Th 6am to 4:30pm

What You Need to Have:

 Good attendanceAbility to communicate properlyMechanically inclinedSolid knowledge with a variety of measuring and hand toolsUnderstand measurementsReliable transportation

Next Steps:

If youre interested in applying for this amazing opportunity, please respond with your updated resume now to secure your interview today! Or, give Ricky a call at 971-246-8432 or Kacie at 971-246-8429

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Fabricator

Performing final checks for defective items

Engaging in positive employee and customer interactions

Inspecting and measuring parts after assembly
Ensuring proper storage and maintenance of production parts, tools, test equipment, and documentation
Adhering to safety procedures, environmental guidelines, and company rules and regulations
Deburring, routing, gluing, custom bending, packaging parts, and moving products onto pallets
Bagging, labeling, and packaging products for safe shipping
Helping keep the Cleanroom clean and properly stocked with supplies
Performing all other duties assigned by supervisor or manager
